resources.string: You\'ve made it to the top 3! \n Enter your name.

GAME INSTRUCTIONS \n\n Pick a topic. Look at the picture and select the correct answer. If your answer is correct, you get a point and the next question appears. If your answer is incorrect, you loose a live. After 5 questions, you get to the next level. If you loose all your lives or do not answer in time, your game is over. After 3 completed levels, you get to the highscore list. If your score is within the best 3, you may enter your name.
Credits for Quickpic: \n all images are from wikicommons, pixabay, or own photos (CC-BY), icons by icons8.de
